item.title: An 80-year-old beloved grandmother and community matriarch, Rose Goodman, was brutally murdered in her own home during a home invasion.

item.title: She Went MISSING & Was Found 43 Years Later
item.description: A missing person case concludes decades later as a woman is finally located, bringing answers to a long-unsolved mystery.

item.title: Wilma June Nissen went missing in 1978 and left as a Jane Doe for decades. Her daughter, Krissi, spent years searching for her, only to discover she was a victim of a brutal unsolved killing. Now, Krissi fights for justice, pushing police to test DNA and solve the case. Despite roadblocks, she won’t give up on her mom.
item.description: Krissi Nissen searches for answers decades after her mother, Wilma June, went missing. DNA testing and renewed investigations aim to solve the long-unsolved case.

item.title: Was All Of THIS Madness Over Debt?
item.description: A look at a situation where a financial disagreement spiraled, highlighting how conflicts over debt can have serious consequences.

item.title: A family of three, John Gerrish, Ellen Chung, their 1-year-old daughter, Miju, and their dog, went hiking in California’s Sierra National Forest and were later found dead on the trail. #truestories #murder #truecrime #fblifestyle
item.description: Investigators are examining the circumstances surrounding the deaths of a family and their dog during a hike in the Sierra National Forest.

item.title: Was This The 'Perfect' Heist?
item.description: Investigators revisit a daring heist, exploring how it was carried out and whether it truly earned the title of being a “perfect” crime.

item.title: Richard Allen, a 50-year-old man from Delphi with no prior criminal record, was arrested in 2022 for the 2017 murders of Abby and Libby. Police believe he acted alone, but details about the evidence are still sealed. #truecrime #truestories #murder #fblifestyle
item.description: In 2022, Richard Allen was arrested for the 2017 Delphi murders of Abby and Libby. Police believe he acted alone, though case details remain sealed.
